name: EX Drones: CHAOS II
description:
OrfeasWorldGames Studio Are Returning To Their Old Roots With The EX Drones: CHAOS! Chaos II Has Finally Released, After 8 Months Since It's Release, CHAOS II Has Got Released!

___WHAT DOES CHAOS II INCLUDES?___

The Main Reason Why EX Drones CHAOS II Was Delayed Was The Graphics & The Mechanics. We Didn't Wanted To Give You The CHAOS II Being Like CHAOS I Graphics. IN CHAOS II We Added HDRP Graphics Which Provide You Better Experience!

Also Much More Stuff Added Which You Can Find All Of Them In-Game

___STORY OF EX DRONES___

The Post Appocalyptic Game 'EX Drones' Is Based On The Future Where Many People Got Cought By The New Generations Called 'EX-Drones' Their Creator Was Mr.Jonathan Who Had The Best IQ On The Academy Of Physicians, And He Was Their Best Student & Teen Ager! As A Teenager We Worked For The Military And He Had A Goal..MAKING A BETTER WORLD, He Said. Something Went Wrong, His Heart Filled With Evilness But He Didn't Stopped Working On His Project 'EX-DRONES' 9 Times In A Row He Failed, But He Never Gave Up! 
(that's why we named the franchise EX Drones) The EX Is For Experimental X, What Does X Stands For? In Latin X Is The Number 10, Did You Noticed It? ALL The Experimentals Went Wrong Until The 10th Experimental The 'EX-Drones' 

Your Name Is EX-Guy Because You Are The One Who Can Defeat The EX-Drones! IN CHAOS II, Will You End These New Generations?

UNTIL TODAY....Mr.Jonathan Went Missing & No One Saw Him..

NOTICE: THE GAME STILL HAVE BUGS AND IT'S NOT FINISHED! SOME PLACES ARE EMPTY WITHOUT ENEMIES.
